General.Name: Shanxi Coal International Energy Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanxi Coal International Energy Group Co.,Ltd engages in the coal production business in China and internationally. It offers thermal, coking, anthracite, and semi-anthracite coal. It engages in the mining, washing, and sale of coal; waterway general cargo transportation; sale metal and non-metallic materials; sale of plastic and rubber products; and investment activities. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Taiyuan, China. Shanxi Coal International Energy Group Co.,Ltd is a subsidiary of Shanxi Coal Import and Export Group Co., Ltd.
